name: The Spring Grimoires
description:
This is an early demo of a new game I'm working on. Play as Reid an experienced adventurer who sets out to defeat a monster terrorizing his villages after King Emeric has asked for his assistance. 

This is the first official game I have developed in RPG Maker MZ. This demo will lead into a much larger community driven game. If you would like to take part in the community game please visit my Twitch Channel.
